data.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar
data.quote: I am highly offended by the total lack of acknowledgement of my contribution to Laker success.

data.author: Ellen Stofan
data.quote: You see countries like India really investing in their space program because they see it as inspirational and good for their economy.

data.author: Alia Bhatt
data.quote: My dad is too cute. Every morning, he sends me one motivational quote. I have a folder full of all his quotes.

data.author: Joyce Meyer
data.quote: A #2 pencil and a dream can take you anywhere.

data.author: Douglas Conant
data.quote: Learning to celebrate success is a key component of learning how to win in the market.

data.author: Denis Diderot
data.quote: You have to make it happen.

data.author: Ian Ziering
data.quote: Past success is no guarantee of future success, so I have learned to be an entrepreneur. I began to produce and direct my own projects.

data.author: Henry David Thoreau
data.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.

data.author: Kin Hubbard
data.quote: There's no secret about success. Did you ever know a successful man who didn't tell you about it?

data.author: Henry David Thoreau
data.quote: What is called genius is the abundance of life and health.

data.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
data.quote: Earn your success based on service to others, not at the expense of others.

data.author: Denis Waitley
data.quote: Our limitations and success will be based, most often, on your own expectations for ourselves. What the mind dwells upon, the body acts upon.

data.author: George Reeves
data.quote: Knock the 't' off the 'can't'

data.author: Winston Churchill
data.quote: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.

data.author: Augustus Hare
data.quote: Thought is the wind, knowledge the sail, and mankind the vessel.

data.author: William James
data.quote: Begin to be now what you will be hereafter.

data.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
data.quote: Success consecrates the most offensive crimes.

data.author: Ewan McGregor
data.quote: Success is tricky to deal with, both professionally and in your personal life.

data.author: Mia Hamm
data.quote: I've worked too hard and too long to let anything stand in the way of my goals. I will not let my teammates down and I will not let myself down.

data.author: Florence Scovel Shinn
data.quote: You will be a failure, until you impress the subconscious with the conviction you are a success. This is done by making an affirmation which 'clicks.'
